abstract: Mrs. Clinton’s campaign will air four new ads in Iowa and New Hampshire during tonight’s Republican presidential debate, spots that tell the stories of different women fighting for pay equity or college affordability without focusing on Mrs. Clinton.

headline.main: During Republican Debate, Hillary Clinton to Air Ads Focusing on Women
